snippet: Los Angeles Lakers guard Steve Blake will be out at least six weeks with a torn ligament in his right elbow.
abstract: Los Angeles Lakers guard Steve Blake will be out at least six weeks with a torn ligament in his right elbow.
lead_paragraph: Los Angeles Lakers guard Steve Blake will be out at least six weeks with a torn ligament in his right elbow.

headline.main: Lakers’ Blake Sidelined With Injured Elbow
